Sorce Manufacturing

--ABOUT US


SORCE MANUFACTURING. We are production machine shop located in Yuba City, specializing in production C.N.C turning. We also have a tooling department for your prototype or short-run orders. By paying attention to detail, using the state of the art equipment, we can offer you premium quality machine parts efficiently and economically. We are a good vendor looking for good customers. We will give you what you want when you want it at a price you can live with. We would appreciate the opportunity to meet with you and discuss your machining needs.

ALUMINUM V-GROOVE WHEEL

Wheel face and bore are machined for concentricity to proper tracking. These wheels can be used not only on track but flat surfaces as well. VL wheels feature a larger bore for greater capacity.
